data.question: What is the chemical formula of MFM-188?
What is the highest CO2 uptake recorded for MFM-188a at 298 K and 1.0 bar?
What technique was used to determine the adsorption domains for CO2 and C2H2 in MFM-188a?
Is the CO2 uptake of MFM-188a at 0.15 bar higher than 3.9 wt%?
What is the role of amide groups in MFM-188a for gas adsorption?
data.answer: Amide groups participate in gas adsorption via H-bonding.

data.question: Does MFM-188a exhibit a higher C2H2 uptake capacity at 295 K compared to HKUST-1?
What is the BET surface area of MFM-188a?
Can MFM-188a selectively adsorb CO2 over N2?
What is the crystal system of MFM-188?
What method was used for the activation of MFM-188?
data.answer: Solvent exchange with methanol followed by flowing supercritical CO2

data.question: Is the total pore volume of MFM-188a greater than 1.0 cm3 g-1?
What is the role of open metal sites in MFM-188a?
data.answer: Open metal sites are primary binding domains for guest molecules.

data.question: Does MFM-188a have a higher density of open metal sites compared to MOF-74Mg?
What is the Qst value for CO2 adsorption in MFM-188a?
What is the significance of the Qst plots not displaying any major decrease across the whole adsorption range for MFM-188a?
data.answer: It suggests the presence of other favourable binding sites in addition to OMSs.

data.question: What is the crystallographic space group of desolvated MFM-188a?
Is the CO2 uptake capacity of MFM-188a at 273 K higher than 200 cm3 g-1?
What is the role of the tetra-amide functionalization in MFM-188?
data.answer: It is responsible for the high uptakes of acetylene and carbon dioxide due to cooperative binding between guest molecules.

data.question: Does MFM-188a have a higher BET surface area than MOF-74Co?
What is the internal pore size of cages B and C in MFM-188?
data.answer: Approximately 11 x 11 x 17 Å and 17 x 17 x 17 Å, respectively.
